definition: to deduct marks (when grading school work)/to have marks deducted/penalty points/to lose points for a penalty or error

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Any deviation from this ideal must be penalized to the extent of the deviation.
sentences.chinese: 任何偏離這個理想，必須扣分的偏差程度。

sentences.english: Any deviation from the center results in a downgrading during a competition.
sentences.chinese: 任何偏離滾轉中心軸的動作都會在競賽中被扣分。

sentences.english: This will not be penalised if it does not affect communication。
sentences.chinese: 如果這些母語特徵並不影響整體交流將不會被扣分。

sentences.english: No points are deducted for bad style or lateness.
sentences.chinese: 壞的編程風格或遲交併沒有扣分。

sentences.english: However, avoid wild guessing – especially if marks are taken off for wrong answers.
sentences.chinese: 但是要避免瞎猜，特別是如果答錯要扣分的話。

sentences.english: This will not be penalised if it does not affect communication.
sentences.chinese: 如果這些母語特徵並不影響整體交流將不會被扣分。

sentences.english: Nonparticipation, or not being there, that will lower your participation grade.
sentences.chinese: 不參與，或是不出勤，那將會扣分。

sentences.english: Q7:Does carelessness usually affect your score in the exam?
sentences.chinese: 考試的時候你經常因爲粗心大意而被扣分麼？

sentences.english: Drivers who accumulate 15 or more demerits in two years can lose their licences for up to three months.
sentences.chinese: 司機累積扣分達十五分就會被吊銷牌照三個月。

sentences.english: Many mistakes will result in the grammar score being penalised.
sentences.chinese: 語法錯誤的扣分遠比大家想象的要嚴重許多。

sentences.english: No marks will be deducted for wrong answers.
Essays exhibiting such errors will be penalized.
sentences.chinese: 有這類錯誤的文章將被扣分。

definition: to break the rules/to violate regulations
to run a red light/failing to stop at a red traffic light/(slang) to have sex with a girl while she is menstruating
to exceed the speed limit/to speed/high-speed

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
pressure crease/fig. to toil for sb else's benefit/line ball (i.e. on the line)
